mapper.insert: INSERT INTO directories (directory_id, parent_directory_id, user_id, name) VALUES ( #{directoryId}, #{parentDirectoryId}, #{userId}, #{name})
mapper.update: UPDATE directories SET name = #{name}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE directory_id = #{directoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT directory_id FROM directories WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND parent_directory_id is NULL
